description: Reconstruction of the road structure, installation of the rip-rap, installation of the asphalt and shoulder material, reinstallation of current pipe, mobilization and demobilization all equipment necessary to make work progress for the entire contract, including environmental controls and all associated items in strict accordance with specifications and accompanying drawings and subject to all terms and condition of this contract
duration_in_months: You cannot commute by air. The travel distance of 1500 km can be traveled by car in approx. 15 days, depending on traffic and road conditions and according to the contractor usual contemporary specification for duration for this type of project is advisable to refurbish in approximately 14 days
